title: What time is Mrs Brown’s Boys’ New Year’s Day special on TV tonight?
text:
Mrs Brown’s Boys is a ratings winner each Christmas (Picture: BBC)

With 2020 safely under way, it’s about time you snuggle up with an old familiar – Mrs Brown’s Boys is back for another festive special.

Though some critics have given the show a grilling in its time – something show-creator Brendan O’Carroll doesn’t care about – it’s been a fan-favourite for years, with The Queen reportedly a fan.

Tonight’s episode, titled Orange Is The New Mammy, is the second festive special for 2019.

When is the special airing and what’s it about? We’ve got the details here…

What time is Mrs Brown’s Boys on tonight?

Mrs Brown’s Boys’ New Year’s special airs tonight, 1 January at 10:30pm on BBC One.

It’s the second festive special, with the first – It’s A Wonderful Mammy – airing on Christmas Day.

In tonight’s episode, Agnes (Brendan O’Carroll) discovers that Peggy Piper, the Pernod poisoner, is being released from prison and could be coming back to town.

Advertisement

Advertisement

This spells bad news for Winnie (Eilish O’Carroll) as she was the one who saw her old friend poison her husband and gave the evidence that put her behind bars in the first place.

Meanwhile, Dermot (Paddy Houlihan) hires an expensive tank costume for his latest promotion – only for Buster (Danny O’Carroll) to go and lose it.

After tonight’s special, Mrs Brown’s Boys will go on tour in 2020 again, with Brendan O’Carroll discussing the possibility of another full series at some point.

Mrs Brown’s Boys has toured all over the world (Picture: Graeme Hunter Pictures)

He told Metro.co.uk: ‘I’m happy with Christmas specials. At some stage… they continually hint at some stage of having a full series back. Just having a full series.

‘The agreement with the BBC is that when they decide it’s over, it’s over and that suits me fine… But as long as they want to keep running it on Christmas Day I’m gonna keep doing it on Christmas Day and hopefully get better and better and better.’

Mrs Brown’s Boys airs tonight, 10:30pm on BBC One.

MORE: Mrs Brown’s Boys is ‘number one comedy in Jamaica’ according to show’s creator Brendan O’Carroll

MORE: Mrs Brown’s Boys star Brendan O’Carroll ‘one month away from heart failure’ but saved by miracle chat show appearance
